name: openvpn
title: OpenVPN
description: This extension allows you to connect and disconnect from an OpenVPN using applescript to control OpenVPN client.
author: benekuehn

commands.name: list-profiles
commands.title: Profiles OpenVPN
commands.description: List OpenVPN profiles and connect/disconnect them.

commands.name: toggle-last-profile
commands.title: Toggle Last Profile OpenVPN
commands.description: Connect/Disconnect the last OpenVPN profile used
